label: logicA:psychology_en
steps: [1] If the client reports chronic sleep difficulty, then their stress level is elevated.
[2] If stress is elevated, then concentration declines.
[3] For any person, if they practice daily mindfulness, then their anxiety decreases.
[5] The client reports chronic sleep difficulty.
[6] Therefore their stress level is elevated.
[9] Therefore the client has reduced concentration and decreased anxiety.
